channel.title: KiCad PCB Design Pages on Embedded Systems Design
channel.description: Recent content in KiCad PCB Design Pages on Embedded Systems Design

item.title: Adding Text to your PCB in KiCad
item.description: Background Why add text to my PCB? It is important to label your PCB.

item.title: Exporting Gerber files from KiCad PCB Editor
item.description: Introduction What is a Gerber file? A Gerber file (also known as artwork) is a 2-D graphical representation of a single layer of a PCB.

item.title: KiCad PCB FAQ
item.description: Why the width of the power traces needs to be larger than the signal traces?

item.title: PCB Design Rules Setup in KiCAD
item.description: Introduction Before reading this, review Peralta Lab PCB Mill Specs. We will pull information from there to set up PCB design rules in KiCAD.

item.title: PCB Design Tutorial
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will go over how to get started with your PCB design, as well as go over the things you will use while designing your PCB.

item.title: Rubout Area for your PCB in KiCad
item.description: Background What is a Rubout area? Some electrical components will contain an antenna for wireless communication.
